arguments.name: victim
arguments.description: the user to spam, as a mention

arguments.name: number
arguments.description: the number of messages to send before stopping

arguments.name: frequency
arguments.description: the frequency with which to send messages, in seconds

arguments.name: messages
arguments.description: the list of messages that the command will choose from
arguments.default: The idiot who decided to spam you forgot to tell me what to spam you with
